text: allah nur alsmwat wal'ard yudabir al'amr fihima wayahdi ahlhma, fhw- sbhanh- nwr, whjabh nwr, bih astnart alsmwat wal'ard wama fyhma, wakitab allah whdayth nur minh sbhanh, falawla nurih taealaa ltrakmt alzulumat baeduha fawq bed. mathal nurih aldhy yahdi 'ilyh, wahu al'iiman walquran fi qalb almumin kmshkat, wahi alkuwwat fi alhayit ghyr alnafdht, fiha msbah, hayth tajmae alkwwat nur almisbah fala ytfrq, wdhlk almisbah fi zjajt, ka'anaha -lsfayha- kawkab mdy' kalddur, ywqad almisbah min zayt shajaratan mbarkt, wahi shajaratan alzytwn, laa sharqiat fqt, fala tsybha alshams akhar alnhar, wala gharbiat faqat fala tsybha alshams 'awal alnhar, bal hi mutawasitat fi makan min al'ard la 'iilaa alshrq wala 'iilaa alghrb, yakad zaytuha -lsfayh- yudi' min nafsih qabl 'an tmsh alnar, fa'iidha massath alnaar 'ada' 'ida't blyght, nur ealaa nwr, fahu nur min 'ishraq alzayt ealaa nur min 'iisheal alnar, fdhlk mithl alhudaa yudi' fi qalb almwmn. wallah yahdi wywfq latbae alquran man ysha', wayadrib al'amthal llnas; lyeqlu eanh 'amthalih whkmh. wallah bikuli shay' elym, la yakhfaa ealayh shy'
